Hi! You are invited to participate in a poll by @ICR_NIH @KKMPutrajaya. This #poll will help to gauge the acceptance of #parents with #children (age <12 yrs old) towards the #COVID19 #vaccine. To participate,pls click👉 https://t.co/IVnArA9f4z
